mdRecord.dcterms:title: A map of the United States of North America: drawn from a number of critical researches / by A. Arrowsmith, Geographer, No. 24 Rathbone Place
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Arrowsmith, Aaron, 1750-1823 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map on 4 sheets : hand col. ; 126 x 143 cm. (complete image)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown with hauchures and pictorially. [original]
Before the addition of "Ohio" on the upper left sheet. [original]

The cartouche, which pictures Niagara Falls, is followed by descriptive text "Falls of Niagara." Text concerning boundaries that appeared in lower left corner of the 1796 map is no longer present. [original]

Library has 2 copies, both with some sheets pasted together to form 2 sheets. In one copy, the upper right verso of each double sheet is numbered 65 and 66. In the other copy, sheets are numbered 21-22. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 1-2: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Maps
North America--Maps
